Feedback


1. On a scale of 1-5, with one lowest and five highest, please rate the relevance and value of each of these Session segments to your business needs:

Introduction – What is NLP & Why Learn It?
The NLP Communication Model
Representational Skills
Practical Exercises
Usefulness of the supporting app
2. On a scale of 1-5, with one the least and five the most, please indicate which of these course topics should receive more or less time and depth of coverage in the future:
Introduction – What is NLP & Why Learn It?
The NLP Communication Model
Representational Skills
Practical Exercises
3. Please indicate your opinion on the presentation of the course
Fluency & presentation skills of trainer
Subject knowledge of trainer
Approachability of trainer
Amount of time given to questions
Quality of visual aids
Quality of the supplied app
4. Would you recommend this Session to a colleague?

5. Optional:
